info.report-description: LTE EPS Bearer measurement (M8006) measures EPS Bearer related measurements.

kpi_info.title: period_duration
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup attempts. Each bearer of the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_COMPLETIONS
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup completions. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_RNL
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to any Radio Network Layer cause except "radio resources not available". Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME with any RNL cause except "radio resources not available".

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_TRPORT
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Transport Layer. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_RESOUR
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Radio Resource reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE has to be counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME with RNL cause "radio resources not available".

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_OTH
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Other reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_NORM
kpi_info.use: The number of released Data Radio Bearers due to "normal release per call". Each bearer of the "E-RAB To Be Released List" IE has to be counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_DETACH
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to the Detach procedure by the UE or MME (NAS cause). Each bearer of the "E-RAB To Be Released List" IE has to be counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_RNL
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to the Radio Network Layer cause. Each bearer of the "E-RAB to be Released List" IE is counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH
kpi_info.use:
The number of released Data-Radio Bearers due to Other Reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB To Be Released List" IE has to be counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearer are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.
The counter is updated if the release cause does not match any other failure counter.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_NORM
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to the UE inactivity. In case of the UE context release request, all the established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_RNL
kpi_info.use: The number of E-RABs requested to be released in case a Radio Link Failure is detected by eNB. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message from the eNB to the MME in case this message is sent due to a detected Radio Link Failure (RNL cause "Radio Connection with UE lost"). All released E-RABs are counted.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to Other causes . In case of a UE context release request, all the established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME. The counter is updated if the release request detected does not match any other failure counter

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_TNL
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to Transport Layer Cause UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to the MME.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPSBEAR_REL_REQ_RNL_REDIR
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due Redirect (release due to RNL E-UTRAN generated reason or RNL Inter-RAT Redirection). UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_1
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts per QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request sent by MME to the eNB for each QCI1 bearer contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEAR_STP_ATT_INI_NON_GBR
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts per non-GBR. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request message sent by the MME to the eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_1
kpi_info.use: The number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts per QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:E-RAB Setup Request message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup completions per QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEAR_STP_COM_INI_NON_GBR
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup completions per non-GBR. Each bearer of the E-RAB Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEAR_SET_COM_ADDIT_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_N_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to normal release by UE. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_D_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to the Detach procedure by the UE or the MME. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_R_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to the Radio Network Layer cause. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_O_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to Other causes. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP:UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.The counter is updated if the release request detected does not match any other failure counter.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_N_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to the Normal release. In case of a UE context release request, all the established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Indication or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_R_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to Radio Network Layer cause. In case of a UE context release request, all the established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Indication or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_O_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to Other causes . In case of a UE context release request, all the established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB Release indication or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.The counter is updated if the release request detected does not match any other failure counter

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_T_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due Transport Layer Cause - Transport Resource UnavailableCause. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Indication or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_RD_QCI1
kpi_info.use: The number of eNB-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due Redirect (release due to RNL E-UTRAN generated reason or RNL Inter-RAT Redirection ) UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Indication or an S1AP: UE Context Release Request from the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI_2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI_3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI_4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_ADD_QCI_2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME.The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_ADD_QCI_3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_ADD_QCI_4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: PRE_EMPT_GBR_BEARER
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of GBR E-RABs (Guaranteed Bit Rate bearers, 3GPP TS 23.203) being released due to lack of radio resources. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) in case that these messages are used to release one or more GBR bearers with RNL cause "Radio resources not available". The counter is updated with the number of released GBR bearers.

kpi_info.title: PRE_EMPT_NON_GBR_BEARER
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of non-GBR E-RABs (non-Guaranteed Bit Rate bearers, 3GPP TS 23.203) being released due to lack of radio resources. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) in case that these messages are used to release one or more non-GBR bearers with RNL cause "Radio resources not available". The counter is updated with the number of released non-GBR bearers.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI1
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI1 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI1 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI2 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI2 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI3 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI3 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI4 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI4 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_NON_GBR
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with non-GBR characteristics (QCI5...9). The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with non-GBR characteristics (QCI5...9) and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI1
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI1 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI1 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI2
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI2 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI2 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI3
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI3 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI3 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI4
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI4 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI4 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_NON_GBR
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with non-GBR (QCI5..9) characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with non-GBR characteristics (QCI5..9) shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
